question: Which passengers have experienced the most flight delays in 2024?
query:
SELECT p.passenger_id, COUNT(*) AS delay_count
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON bp.passenger_id = p.passenger_id
WHERE f.status = 'Delayed'
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM f.scheduled_departure) = 2024
GROUP BY p.passenger_id
ORDER BY delay_count DESC;
